synonyms: padmanābha—Lord Padmanābha; śaṅkha—conch; padma—lotus; cakra—disc; gadā—club; kara—in the hands; dāmodara—Lord Dāmodara; padma—lotus; cakra—disc; gadā—club; śaṅkha—conch; dhara—holding.
translation: "Lord Padmanābha holds the conch, lotus, disc and club. Lord Dāmodara holds the lotus, disc, club and conch.
